mapper.select: select NVL(sum(pay),0) from payment where substr(pay_day,1,2)=#{year} and substr(pay_day,4,2)=#{month}
select NVL(sum(pay),0) from payment where pay_day >= #{startday} and pay_day <= #{endday}
select mid, rpad(substr(mpwd,0,2),length(mpwd),'*') as mpwd, mname, mphone, memail, to_char(mregdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') as mregdate, login_type, gname from members m, grade g where m.gnum=g.gnum

select NVL(count(*),0) from house
where bnum=#{company}
select nvl(count(*),0) from b_event b, house h where b.bnum=h.bnum and h.business_id=#{bid}
select bnum,count(bnum) as cnt from house group by bnum order by bnum
select bnum,nvl(count(*),0) as cnt from house where business_id=#{bid} group by bnum order by bnum

select nvl(sum(pay),0) as pay, to_char(pay_day,'YYYY/MM') as pay_day, LTRIM(substr(to_char(pay_day,'YYYY/MM'),6,2),'0') as month from payment where pay_day>=#{year}||'-01-01' and pay_day<#{years}||'-01-01' group by to_char(pay_day,'YYYY/MM') order by pay_day

select nvl(sum(pay),0) as pay, to_char(p.pay_day,'YYYY/MM') as pay_day , LTRIM(substr(to_char(pay_day,'YYYY/MM'),6,2),'0') as month from payment p, booking_table b, rooms r, house h where p.booking_num=b.booking_num and b.room_num=r.room_num and r.house_num=h.house_num and p.pay_day>=#{year}||'-01-01' and p.pay_day<#{years}||'-01-01' and h.business_id=#{bid} group by to_char(pay_day,'YYYY/MM') order by pay_day
